snippet: J. Michael Evans, once seen as a potential candidate to be Goldman’s chief executive, will help the Chinese e-commerce giant expand abroad.
abstract: DealBook Online; Alibaba Group names former Goldman Sachs executive J MIchael Evans as its new president.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: J. Michael Evans, once seen as a potential candidate to be Goldman’s chief executive, will help the Chinese e-commerce giant expand abroad.

headline.main: Alibaba Names Former Goldman Sachs Executive as President
